game.name: Vampires Lore
game.description:
Playing vampire games requires full of concentration and awesome weapon operating abilities. If you also love to be indulged in a war where only brave souls can survive, trying out Vampires Lore can be a nice bet for you. Join as a deadly vampire in this awesome online multiplayer game and allow yourself to keep you engrossed for long hours! This fight is going to be memorable for all as you will have a wonderful opportunity to practice your strong fighting skills and special magic abilities. 
Do not take your enemies lightly as they are also packed with sharp weapons and immense power. Check out first what weapons and power you have to crush your opponents on the battle ground in this one of the best 3D war games for kids! Be careful while using your magic powers as they are available in a limited number! Use all of the four unique spells and enter the battlefield to combat against vampires from across the world! Choose any mode between the two and explore two awesome maps as per your choice!
You can look into the tutorial to learn the details of the game. Create your own game and click the open games to start the fun immediately! Click the setting button to make changes in “Player Name”, “Master Volume” and “Sensitivity.” Once it is done, do not forget to click the save button to save all the changes you made. Press the RMB to shoot a dark energy ball! This html5 best vampire games for children includes four magic spells, two models, and two awesome maps. With easy controls and dynamic graphics and multiple modes, it can keep you busy for hours. Have fun online without download in your device!

game.webControlKeys: ALLARROWS ,W,A,S,D, TO MOVE,L SHIFT TO RUN, SPACE-JUMP, R MOUSE -SPELL,L MOUSE-ATTACK, 1-4 KEYS TO CHANGE THE SPELLS,MOVE MOUSE TO LOOK AROUND
